name: Escape: A game jam game
description:
This was a game create for the twitch streamer moonmoon_ow's first game jam.

Created in 2 days. 

Escape is a 3d platformer based on evasion. You must navigate the facility you've been trapped in to collect 6 red orbs. After collecting 6 the final purple orb will be revealed. Once touched, the white block which blocks the exit will open, and you may leave.

Be warned, for there are 2 things to stop your way, and they are relentless.

Controls:
WASD For basic movement.
Left Shift to sprint
Space to jump
Space (hold) to wall climb or wall jump (only works on > 45 degree angle from the wall, based on the camera direction)
Space (in the air) to double jump
Right click (down) to fire grapple hook
Right click (release) to release grapple

Notes: 
Recommend 50% volume due to audio glitches.

Also the game doesn't actually have a proper ending. However if you hit the 7th orb and make it through the blocked area to the final area, you've sufficiently beat the game.

Special thanks to:

Thiccvana for Voice Acting the robot girl

AlienTree for the music and audio

Aurum for the character designs, concepts, art and ideas.
